title: Can Aqeeqah be done after child grows up? Can the child do Aqeeqah for himself if parents didn't do?
transcript: ibrahim says if a child grows and finds out that his parents did not offer they did not slaughter iran or two when he was born as per the sunnah are the parents allowed to do it now after the child is 20 or 30 years of age no problem if the parents don't want to do it or they're no more living can the child himself do it for himself there's no problem in that insha allah
